synopsis.text: Qiu, a once ordinary young man, finds himself reborn into the world of a xianxia novel as the notorious scum villain, Shen Qingqiu. As the hypocritical and deceitful mentor to the novel's overpowered protagonist, Luo Binghe, Shen Qingqiu is destined for a gruesome end at the hands of his own disciple. Determined to change his fate, Shen Qingqiu embarks on a mission to stay on Luo Binghe's good side, all while navigating the restrictions of a troll system that limits his actions and punishes him for straying from his villainous character. As he struggles to survive and maintain his new identity, Shen Qingqiu discovers that the lines between good and evil are blurred, and that even scum villains can have a chance at redemption. Follow Shen Qingqiu on his journey to prove that even the most despised villains can live, and be cool while doing it.
